input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Seiko Men's SSK023 5 Sports Field GMT Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Marine Star Chronograph Quartz Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Sutton Chronograph Watch 96B310'
  - Name='Men's Bulova Parking Meter Chronograph Limited Watch 98B390'
  - Name='ORIENT STAR OUTDOOR COLLECTION'
  - Name='Orient Men's Automatic Black Dial Full Working Jewels'
  - Name='Men's Seiko SRPD57 5 Sports 24-Jewel Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Flynn Watch'
  - Name='OrientDress Watch (Model: RA-AG0005L), Blue'
  - Name='Orient Men's Automatic Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Orient Men's Bambino Automatic RA-AK0701S30B Watch RA-AK0701S10B'
  - Name='Orient Diver's Wrist Watch AZ-1826'
  - Name='Orient Sports Automatic White Dial Men's Watch RA-AC0Q08S30B, Automatic Movement, Leather Strap, 39.9 mm Case in Black / White'
  - Name='Orient Men's Orient Kamasu Automatic Watch RA-AA0003R19B'
  - Name='Orient Bambino Version 7 LE Automatic Men's Watch'
  - Name='Orient Bambino Automatic Men's Watch'
  - Name='Orient Men's Automatic Gray Dial Day Date'
  - Name='Orient Men's Bambino Automatic Watch TAC00009'
  - Name='Orient Men's Tri Star Automatic Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Orient Star Automatic Green Dial Men's Watch RE-AT0002E00B, Automatic Movement, Stainless Steel Strap, 39.3 mm Case in Green'
  - Name='Hamilton Khaki Mechanical Field Watch'
  - Name='Orient Sports Ray II Automatic Stainless Steel Men's Watch'
  - Name='Orient Bambino SUN & MOON Automatic Watch Mechanical Automatic RN-AK0803Y Men's'
  - Name='TISSOT Men's PR516 Powermatic 80'
  - Name='Citizen Eco-Drive Chronograph Green Dial Men's Watch CA4505-21X'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's SSK023 5 Sports Field GMT Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A sports field watch with GMT functionality and durable build, somewhat similar in purpose to a rugged adventure watch, though movement and specific features differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Marine Star Chronograph Quartz Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A marine star chronograph implies a water-resistant sports watch with quartz movement, yet chronograph focus and style differ from the simpler field/adventure style of Expedition Scout.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Sutton Chronograph Watch 96B310
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chronograph dress watch style is less aligned with the rugged, durable field watch and titanium construction of the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Bulova Parking Meter Chronograph Limited Watch 98B390
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Limited edition chronograph with specialized design is less focused on field/outdoor utility and ruggedness compared to Timex Expedition.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ORIENT STAR OUTDOOR COLLECTION
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Outdoor-focused collection likely shares rugged field watch traits, solid construction and suitability for adventure comparable to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Men's Automatic Black Dial Full Working Jewels
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic movement with classic styling lacks emphasis on rugged, shock-resistant, titanium construction or high water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Seiko SRPD57 5 Sports 24-Jewel Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Seiko 5 sports line is rugged and functional for active use, somewhat similar in spirit though automatic movement and case materials likely differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Flynn Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fossil Flynn is more of a fashion-oriented watch, lacking specific rugged or titanium features emphasized in the Timex.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: OrientDress Watch (Model: RA-AG0005L), Blue
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress watch styling and construction differ significantly from rugged outdoor focus of reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Men's Automatic Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic stainless steel watches are less focused on lightweight and shock-resistant titanium but may have some practical utility.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Men's Bambino Automatic RA-AK0701S30B Watch RA-AK0701S10B
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic dress watch style with automatic movement is stylistically quite different from rugged field watch design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Diver's Wrist Watch AZ-1826
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Diver's watch with high water resistance aligns with rugged and water-resistant traits of reference product, though diver style differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Sports Automatic White Dial Men's Watch RA-AC0Q08S30B, Automatic Movement, Leather Strap, 39.9 mm Case in Black / White
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sports automatic watch with leather strap is relatively aligned on function and construction, but automatic movement and possibly less titanium use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Men's Orient Kamasu Automatic Watch RA-AA0003R19B
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A durable automatic diver-style watch has rugged and active use overlap, though lacks titanium and quartz simplicity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Bambino Version 7 LE Automatic Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Luxury dress watch categorization with automatic movement is hardly comparable to rugged, shock-resistant field watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Bambino Automatic Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similarly, a dress automatic watch does not share core rugged or titanium features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Men's Automatic Gray Dial Day Date
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While functional with day/date, this automatic watch lacks stated rugged/titanium features and is less field-oriented.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Men's Bambino Automatic Watch TAC00009
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress watch style again diverges strongly from rugged outdoor watch traits.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Men's Tri Star Automatic Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A basic automatic stainless steel watch with practical day/date features moderately aligns on function but lacks titanium and shock-resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Star Automatic Green Dial Men's Watch RE-AT0002E00B, Automatic Movement, Stainless Steel Strap, 39.3 mm Case in Green
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Well-built automatic watch offering durability but stylistically less field watch and no titanium or shock-resistance emphasized.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Khaki Mechanical Field Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly relevant; a mechanical field watch focused on durability, ruggedness, and clarity, shares core use case and design principles despite different movement and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Sports Ray II Automatic Stainless Steel Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A diver-styled sports automatic watch emphasizing durability and water resistance aligns moderately well on ruggedness and outdoor use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Bambino SUN & MOON Automatic Watch Mechanical Automatic RN-AK0803Y Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress watch with sun & moon complication focuses on style over rugged, tactical field watch purposes.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: TISSOT Men's PR516 Powermatic 80
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A quality automatic sports watch with solid construction, though more sport racing oriented and less rugged field style or titanium construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Eco-Drive Chronograph Green Dial Men's Watch CA4505-21X
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Eco-Drive quartz chronograph with rugged build and reliability offers useful features for active use, moderately aligned with outdoor ruggedness.
